name: Pie War
description:
Bake an army of sentient pies!

Fight your friend in this two-player battle of baking! Use your pies to destroy their pies and eat their pie! Pie, pie, pie - oh baby!

This game was made with Unity in less than 6 days for Weekly Game Jam #107.  It was quite a crunch, but lots of fun! We didn't get to do everything we wanted with it, but we might finish and polish it someday.
